docs.title: Edu Platform
docs.text: Learn practical automation and system thinking using open-source tools Stat with Python for Operations.

docs.title: Roadmap
docs.text:
This is the first server less webdevelopment, I have created using only open source tool.

The mission here is to create educational site with open source technologies that helps learn python science or pretty much anything that I teach.

docs.title: Objective
docs.text: Learn how to break tasks into Input → Process → Output for automation.

docs.title: What You’ll Learn
docs.text:
• How to think like a systems operator
  • Why planning beats coding first
  • Basic Python concepts (variables, logic)

docs.title: Lesson Content
docs.text:
Every automation follows this pattern:  Input — the raw data or task 2. Process — the logic to handle it 3. Output — the result you want

Example:  Task: Calculate total revenue from sales data.

  • Input: sales.csv
  • Process: sum the "revenue" column
  • Output: total revenue number

docs.title: Pro Tip:
docs.text: Before touching code, write down the steps in plain language. This is the key to thinking like a programmer without being a programmer.
